code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const News=_ref=>{let{category}=_ref;const[articles,setArticles]=useState([]);const apikey='e7521d37d0b7e645b6432c840f3348d8';const url=`https://gnews.io/api/v4/top-headlines?category=${category}&lang=en&country=us&max=10&apikey=${apikey}`;useEffect(()=>{const fetchNews=async()=>{const response=await fetch(url);const data=await response.json();setArticles(data.articles);};fetchNews();},[url,category]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"news",className:"container bg-white my-2 py-5 lg:mx-auto sm:ml-10 p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{id:"pageheading",className:"lg:text-5xl text-3xl font-bold mb-4",children:[category.toUpperCase()," NEWS"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1  md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-4",children:articles.map(article=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"border hover:scale-105 bg-white rounded-lg overflow-hidden shadow-lg",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:article.image,alt:article.title,className:"w-full h-48 "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"font-semibold text-lg",children:article.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray-600",children:article.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:article.url,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",className:"text-blue-500 hover:underline",children:"Read more"})]})]},article.title))})]});};export default News;
